name: Vestiges of Eternity
description:
Harness the power of the Eternals to battle your enemies 

Battle System:

Choose from 8 unique, never before seen character classes such as the Anima Augur, and the Tempest Warden  (4 available in the demo)

All party members can heal, so choose whichever classes you'd like!

Use unique condition attacks to debilitate your enemies and bring them to their knees, the more a condition is applied the stronger the effect!

Battle deadly enemies with unique mechanics that put your skills to the test; should you thin the minions out, or defeat their leader to weaken them? The choice is yours!

Note: This is an early demo of the initial implementation of the battle system
